question: We break our fast with the Adhaan of the radio as there is no mosque in our area. Should my husband give adhaan again before he starts his salaah,will the radio surfice for it.
answer:
QUESTION
Can I,his wife, make Jamaat with him for the fardh salaah, n if so how do I stand ?
ANSWER


Share:
It is advisable for your husband to call out the Adhaan himself. It is also
permissible for you to perform salaah with him. In doing so, you should
stand directly behind him and not along side him.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT
